title: Technology Standards Catalog Schema
description: JSON Schema for validating technology standards catalog YAML files in the Public Transportation Information System architecture

standards.description: List of technology standards adopted in the public transportation information system

id.description: Unique identifier for the technology standard following the pattern standard:XXX, where XXX is a three-digit number

name.description: The name of the technology standard

description.description: Brief description of what the standard defines and its purpose

type.description: The type or category of the technology standard

version.description: Current version of the standard being adopted

usage.description: Description of how the standard is used within the system

data_formats.description: Data formats defined or supported by the standard

security.description: Security considerations or features of the standard

related_technologies.description: List of technologies, tools, or frameworks that implement or support this standard

organization.description: The organization or body that maintains the standard

website.description: Official website URL for the standard

status.description: Current adoption status of the standard

documentation.description: URL or reference to official standard documentation
